article.title: Criteria for Evaluation and Selection of DataBases and Data Base Services
article.author: Williams, M.E.
article.text: Libraries, as potential users of bibliographic data base services, will need to evaluate not only the contents of the many data bases available but the different services provided by various processing centers. Criteria for selection of data bases and data base services such as searching features, logical capacity, document delivery, output format and medium, and costs are examined.
